Class PatchDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • PatchDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PatchDisplay
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A class for displaying a collection of SimpleRhombs. It doesn't allow the user to interact with the SimpleRhobms directly, but it is typically included in a SubstitutionEditor, which does have interactive elements.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • antialiasing

        public static boolean antialiasing
        Toggle graphics antialiasing. On improves the picture, off is faster.

        Toggle supertile outlines.

      • getSupertiles

        public java.util.List<SimpleRhomb> getSupertiles()
        Return a List of SimpleRhombs that are supertiles in this. They will be at the wrong scale, and so must be rescaled by the method that calls this one.
        Returns:
        A List of SimpleRhombs that are supertiles in this.

      • supertilePostscriptString

        public java.lang.String supertilePostscriptString(SimpleRhomb tile)
        String representation of a supertile for Postscript. The method inflates the supertile first.
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile we want to draw.
        Returns:
        A String with instructions for how to draw tile in Postscript.

      • boundingBox

        public java.lang.String boundingBox()
        Produce a String representation of the bounding box of this display for use in creating Postscript output.
        Returns:
        The bounding box in the format "xmin ymin xmax ymax".

      • supertile

        public java.lang.String supertile(int i)
        Produce a String representation of the ith proto-supertile, for use in a postscript file.
        Parameters:
        i - The type of the supertile for which we produce Postscript instructions.
        Returns:
        Postscript instructions for drawing the supertile of type i.
